content.en: Speech authentication: Researchers have proposed various algorithms to address the challenge of authenticating speech content in real-time. These algorithms aim to ensure the authentication of speech data, even in resource-constrained mobile communication terminals. They utilize techniques such as perceptual hashing, Hilbert-Huang Transform, Mel Frequency Cepstral Coefficient (MFCC), wavelet packet decomposition, and spectral subtraction, among others, to achieve robustness, efficiency, discrimination, and tamper detection in speech authentication.
content.da: Talekontrollering: Forskere har foreslået forskellige algoritmer til at imødegå udfordringen med at autentificere taleindhold i realtid. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at sikre autentificeringen af taledata, selv i ressourcebegrænsede mobile kommunikationsterminaler. De anvender teknikker såsom perceptuel hashing, Hilbert-Huang-transform, Mel-frekvens cepstral koefficient (MFCC), wavelet-pakkedecomposition og spektral subtraktion blandt andet for at opnå robusthed, effektivitet, diskrimination og manipulationdetektion i talekontrollering.
